item.title: Mya - Fallen
item.description:
You complete
me
Like air & water boy
I need thee
And when
I’m in your arms
I feel
free fallen
My head’s up
in the clouds
In love I’m proud
to say it loud
Like an accident
it happened
Outta nowhere
it just happened
And I ain’t mad
at all because
I’ve fallen
head over heels
I’ve fallen
in love with you

and I can’t get up

because of love

over heels

ever baby

If you weren’t

head over heels

happiness my joy

is we do
‘Cause I’ve
fallen for you boy
Yeah yeah yeah
fallen

for you boy

So in love with you
in love for you

hold me hold me

love me

lay with me

get up explore me

everything

head over heels

than confident

have to search

like I know my looks

is to please ya
